EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Spring Days_Q217.Atlanta Email #1 Send May 23 (new format-graphic)
EmailTemplate.subject: You’re invited to Spring Days Atlanta
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://springdays.io/?utm_source=uberflip&utm_campaign=spring-days&utm_medium=cta&utm_term=2017]]> July 18-19, 2017 TWELVE Atlantic Station 361 17th Street NW Atlanta, GA 30363
Register <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/atlanta?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-spring-days-2017]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We invite you to join fellow developers from the Atlanta area for a two-day community event of sample code, demos, real-world technical talks, live interaction and networking with industry peers.
Java 9 is in the air. We’re rapidly advancing the Spring Framework--adding flexibility to the programming model for cloud-native, reactive, and functional workloads.
Don’t miss this opportunity to connect with other Java professionals and participate in technical sessions about all things Spring.
Register now <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/atlanta?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-spring-days-2017]]> for $200.00 USD; space is limited and it will sell out.
Blending Product Thinking with Architecture Joel Tosi, Red Green Innovate DevJam Data Pipelines in the Cloud Glenn Renfro Spring Task/Data Flow committer Roy Clarkson, Spring Mobile Lead
What's new in Java 9 Billy Korando, Keyhole Software
Deliver a Better Microservice Faster, using Spring Boot and Spock Burk Hufnagel, Daugherty Business Solutions
Spring Didn't Invent It! Laura Moore, Rightbox Spring Boot and Tensorflow. Machine Learning as a Microservice Dev Gupta, Predikto Inc
Introduction to Spring Boot Eddu Melendez, Advantica Speaker TBA - Submit a talk <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/submit]]>!
Reactive Spring Kenny Bastani, Spring Developer Advocate Speaker TBA - Submit a talk <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/submit]]>!
Register now <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/atlanta?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-spring-days-2017]]> for $200.00 USD; space is limited and it will sell out.
Have questions, or interested in sponsoring? Please contact us at springdays@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springdays@pivotal.io]]>.
We hope to see you there, The Spring Team
